{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Buffalo WLAE-AG300N 01.jpg |image1_size = 100px |caption = AirStation N300 2-Port Dual Band Wireless Ethernet Bridge |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.buffalotech.com/products/wireless/ethernet-bridges/airstation-n300-2-port-dual-band-wireless-ethernet-bridge |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |fandom = Buffalo_AirStation_WLAE-AG300N_Wireless_Access_Point |wikidevi = Buffalo_WLAE-AG300N |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = Supported |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Buffalo |model = WLAE-AG300N |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 11/19/2010 |page_start_origon = https://infodepot.fandom.com/wiki/Buffalo_AirStation_WLAE-AG300N_Wireless_Access_Point |wlclass = AN600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = access point, bridge |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = FDI-09101592-0 |icid = 6102A-029 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Atheros;AR7240; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 24Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 400 <!-- 350 / 400 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Winbond;25X32VSIG; |flash1size = 4 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 32 |ram1chip = Winbond;W9425G6EH-5; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = <!-- 1 --> |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 100MbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 4C:E6:76 |oui = 4C:E6:76
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = <!-- Expansion Interface types, Leave blank for none -->
|pwr_volt_type = VAC |pwr_vac = 100-240 |pwr_ac_hz = <!-- AC Hertz --> |pwr_amp_ac = 0.3 |pwr_conn = C7
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = <!-- flags, Leave blank for none --> |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn
|defaulip = 192.168.11.100 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = 4CE676XXXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^4CE676[A-F0-9]{6}$ |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Gemtek |manuf_model = WRTA-266N |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/15/2010 |estreldate = 08/15/2010 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 747464121765 |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B003ZM17RK |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Atheros;AR9280; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n |rad1n = 300/300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WRTA-266N_V00#A" and "19K-X06-8401R RoHS" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=29260 On the '''OpenWrt Forums'''] (w/ P/Ns) :The FEMs are specified as [http://www.skyworksinc.com/Product.aspx?ProductID=982 '''Skyworks''' ('''SiGe''') SE2593A20 / 2593A20] s.

==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = [http://svn.dd-wrt.com/changeset/15759 WIP Changeset 15759]
wlae-ag-300h build 15962 20101224
